import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

When you burn an [NFT](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/multi-asset-ledger#non-fungible-tokens-nfts),
you permanently remove it from the ledger state, rendering it unusable and nontransferable. The associated [storage deposit](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/storage-deposit) will automatically be returned to its original account.

:::warning irreversible

Burning an NFT is irreversible and signifies the destruction of its digital representation and
associated ownership rights.

:::

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Set `nft_id` as the first NFT Id retrieved by the [`Balance.nfts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/balance/struct.Balance.html#method.nfts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.rs#L35
```

</div>

3. Burn the NFT by calling the [`Wallet.burn()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.burn)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.rs#L44
```

</div>

5. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.rs#L47-L49
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Set `nftId` as the first NFT Id in the balance and display the balance.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.ts#L41-L45
```

</div>

3. Prepare the transaction that will burn the NFT by calling the [`Wallet.prepareBurnNft()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#prepareburnnft) function and send the transaction using the [`Wallet.send()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.ts#L50-L52
```

</div>

4. Create the transaction that will send the NFT using the [`Wallet.sendNft()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#sendnft) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.ts#L56
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Set `nft_id` as the first NFT Id in the [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.py#L19
```

</div>

3. Prepare the transaction that will burn the NFT by calling the [`Wallet.prepare_burn_nft()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#prepare_burn_nft) function and send the prepared transaction using the [`Wallet.send()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/burn_nft.py#L22
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```bash
Transaction sent: 0xed7955f0c2d1a1e267b61b0a1859b58a9b5112385c18feae1a198f3a9992d19e
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0x1c4fe528677089eeffaa01eefe34eda4a75f7c6f2020d83af61221571979f616
Burned NFT 0xd2356323fad25efa3ec772a341d122eaf5ea3bf1cba48b70a1038b7d00bc385d
```
